title: SnowBikeMike RUINS the Gamescast
description:
Mike didn't want to start the podcast like this. From this episode of the Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7jFXI6CK7EY

A brilliant future starts today! Experience the beauty of AI-powered PC gaming with NVIDIA GeForce RTX and DLSS 3: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/technologies/dlss/
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month."
